TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormsAuthenticationUser extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class FormsAuthenticationUser Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 为使用基于窗体验证的 Web 应用程序配置用户凭据。

span.span: Configures the user's credentials for Web applications that use forms-based authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一种以编程方式访问和修改配置文件的[forms 的 forms 身份验证节的凭据元素](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e01fc50a(v=vs.100))的方法。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the [credentials element for forms for authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e01fc50a(v=vs.100)) section of a configuration file. 此类型是包含 、和类型的组的一部分 。This type is part of a group that includes the , the , and the types. 除集合类型之外的类型将直接影响基础配置标记。The types other than the collection type directly affect the underlying configuration tags. > [!NOTE] > 只能 在计算机、站点或应用程序级别将信息写入到配置文件的相关部分。The can write information into the related section of the configuration file at machine, site, or application level only. 尝试在层次结构中的不同级别上写入配置文件将导致分析器生成错误消息。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a different level in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 但是，可以使用此类在层次结构中的任何级别上读取配置信息。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. 为安全起见，建议使用外部存储库（如数据库）来保留用户的凭据。For safety and scalability, it is recommended that you use an external repository, such as a database, to keep the users' credentials. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取 以访问 现有 Web 应用程序的对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the to access the objects of an existing Web application. 配置文件将包含如下所示的设置。The configuration file will contain a setup similar to the following. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用 forms 的[凭据元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5a001f8-fdbe-4c88-80ca-bfe36df23479)部分，请确保遵循[ASP.NET authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eeyk640h(v=vs.100))中所述的准则。If you use the [credentials Element for forms for authentication (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5a001f8-fdbe-4c88-80ca-bfe36df23479) section, be sure to follow the guidelines explained at [ASP.NET Authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eeyk640h(v=vs.100)). 为了实现可伸缩性和更好的安全性，建议使用外部数据库来存储用户凭据。For scalability and better security, it is recommended you use an external database to store the users' credentials. 有关生成安全 ASP.NET 应用程序的详细信息，请参阅[保护 ASP.NET 应用](https://docs.microsoft.com/archive/msdn-magazine/2012/january/asp-net-security-securing-your-asp-net-applications)程序和[构建安全的 ASP.NET 应用程序：身份验证、授权和安全通信](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/msp-n-p/ff649357(v=pandp.10))。For more information about building secure ASP.NET applications, see [Securing Your ASP.NET Application](https://docs.microsoft.com/archive/msdn-magazine/2012/january/asp-net-security-securing-your-asp-net-applications) and [Building Secure ASP.NET Applications: Authentication, Authorization, and Secure Communication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/msp-n-p/ff649357(v=pandp.10)). 此示例使用 SHA1。This example uses SHA1. 由于与 SHA1 冲突，Microsoft 建议使用 SHA256。Due to collision problems with SHA1, Microsoft recommends SHA256. ``` defaultUrl="formsdefault.aspx" protection="Encryption" timeout="5" path="aspnet" slidingExpiration="false" cookieless="UseCookies" domain="domainName"> ```
